title: Ambient display notifications are off centered in hebrew language
content:
Hello, my language on my pixel 2 xl is hebrew (right to left) and it cause the notofication icons on the ambient display to move all the way to the right insted of remaining in the center of the screen (wich works fine when im using english)
I Would like to know how can i fix this problem! 
Thanks!
